bug.author: caisq
bug.summary: tfjs-node: progress bar callback doesn't show enough decimal places for small loss values
bug.description: Currently the ProgbarCallback, which is activated by default for tf.Model.fit() call in tfjs-node, shows only two decimal places. This leads to uninformative printouts such as "loss=0.00, val_loss=0.00" when the loss values are small.
